rqog-package

Installation

library(devtools)
install_github("ropengov/rqog")
library(rqog)

Examples

See the preliminary vignette for more examples

  • ropengov.github.io/rqog/vignettes/rqog_tutorial.html
library(rqog)
# Reading the data
dat <- read_qog(which.data = "standard", data.dir = "datafolder")
